tc_games.app_data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:VirtualDirectories" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>1</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[SubAdminFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>Sub Admin Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>2</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[ResellerFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>Reseller Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>3</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[UserFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>User Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
</ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.VirtualFileSystem.VirtualDirectorySecurity[],TCAdmin.SDK" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="5" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2017-02-24 22:07:54" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:V1_GAME_ID" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:NOTES" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:FileManager" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<FileManagerConfig xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <EditPatterns>
 <string>*.cfg</string>
 <string>*.txt</string>
 <string>*.ini</string>
 </EditPatterns>
 <MaxEditSize>102400</MaxEditSize>
 <EnableDecompress>true</EnableDecompress>
 <EnableCompress>true</EnableCompress>
 <MaxCompressSize>52428800</MaxCompressSize>
 <EnableUpload>true</EnableUpload>
 <EnableDownload>true</EnableDownload>
 <DefaultFileName>custom.cfg</DefaultFileName>
 <WriteBom>false</WriteBom>
</FileManagerConfig>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.Web.FileManager.FileManagerConfig,TCAdmin.SDK.Web" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2023-03-30 23:32:19" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>

tc_game_config_files.template:
server_name=$[HostName] #main_server_ip=$[Service.IpAddress] server_password=$[PrivatePassword] game_client_port=$[Service.GamePort] status_port=$[Service.QueryPort] max_players=$[Service.Slots] #server_name=Hellion Decicated Server #server_password= #game_client_port=_port_ #status_port=_port_ #server_tick_count (Default: 64) #game_client_port (Required) #status_port (Required) #main_server_ip (Required) #main_server_port (Required) #solar_system_time (Default: -1) (-1 = Random) - Time in seconds, start of solar system #save_interval (Default: 900) - Value in seconds (if value = -1 then its off) #server_password (Default: _blank_) #server_name (Required) #max_players (Default: 100) #number_of_save_files (Default: 10) - Max value = 100 #ship_despawn_time (Default: 259200) Value in seconds // 259200=72 hours #ship_despawn_distress (Default: 10800) Value in seconds // 10800=3 hours #ship_despawn_distress_chance (Default: 0.05) Value in % (0-1) #spawn_random_ships_count (Default: 0)
#Note: All server settings that have default value are not required in ini file.
tc_game_config_files.app_data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="5" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2017-02-24 22:07:54" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:NOTES" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2017-02-25 21:32:36" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>
